question.title: Guidance on Upgrading Hibernate from 3.4.3 to 5.4.33 in a Java 8 / Java EE (Maven) Project
question.body:
I'm in the process of upgrading Hibernate from version 3.4.3 to 5.4.33 in a Java 8 + Java EE application built with Maven.

So far, I haven’t been able to locate any official migration guides, compatibility notes, or tools specifically covering such a major version jump (3.x → 5.x).

Are there any recommended resources, step-by-step migration strategies, or known pitfalls I should be aware of? Any help or pointers would be greatly appreciated!

answers.body: The official documentation doesn't have all of them but does have some. So you will need to go through all migration guiders from your version to the target version https://hibernate.org/orm/documentation/migrate/
